DESCRIPTION: Rounds a number to the closest integer.
EXAMPLE: <h3>Round Example</h3> <p>This function rounds a number to the closest integer. <ul> <li>Round(7.49) : <cfoutput>#Round(7.49)#</cfoutput> <li>Round(7.5) : <cfoutput>#Round(7.5)#</cfoutput> <li>Round(-10.775) : <cfoutput>#Round(-10.775)#</cfoutput> <li>Round(-35.5) : <cfoutput>#Round(-35.5)#</cfoutput> <li>Round(35.5) : <cfoutput>#Round(35.5)#</cfoutput> <li>Round(1.2345*100)/100 : <cfoutput>#Round(1.2345*100)/100#</cfoutput> </ul>
USAGE: Use this function to round a number. This function rounds numbers that end with .5 up to the nearest integer. It rounds 3.5 to 4 and â€‘3.5 to -3.
